author: Scott Adam Gordon
title: Plague Inc. fans can use its new scenario creator to make a cat pandemic
text:
Ndemic Creations, the developer of hit mobile title Plague Inc, is releasing a standalone app that will allow you to design and share your own plagues. The scenario creator will deliver five developer tools to help create the situations, letting you control variables like the scenario’s theme, the stats of the plague, how it affects countries, and the government’s response to it.
“Want to make a cat pandemic, an infectious political meme or an alien parasite that makes people’s heads explode?” Wrote the devs in a blog post. “With the Plague Inc: Scenario Creator – you can do all this and lots more! Unleash your creativity and show the world your wonderful/twisted/weird/scary [delete as appropriate] creations.”

A release date is yet to be set but it seems like the new app is quite far into development and it’s $2.99 price tag has already been confirmed. Note that to play your own and other peoples’ scenarios you’ll also have to have the original Plague Inc installed (you can download it for free at the link at the bottom).
Take a look at our favorite Android strategy games at the link and if you’re after similar plague-themed thrills in a board game format, check out Pandemic Legacy .
